title: Fake Graphic Claims Narendra Modi Has 70 Thousand Crores In Swiss Bank
subtitle: BOOM found no media reports about Prime Minister Narendra Modi's swiss bank account.
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
"BREAKING NEWS - BJP's One lakh crore scam scandal was revealed by the CBI. BREAKING NEWS - Modi's 70 thousand crore Swiss bank account busted. A stir in the BJP" (Hindi - BREAKING NEWS - BJP का लाख करोड़ का घोटाला CBI के खुलासे से हड़कंप. BREAKING NEWS - मोदी का 70 हजार करोड़ स्विस बैंक खाते में हुआ पर्दाफाश, BJP मे हड़कंप)

The news graphic has been photoshopped and a Google search shows that no such news was reported by any media outlet. Additionally, the fake graphic uses a template similar to that used by Hindi news channel ABP News, to make it look genuine. The photograph of Abhisar Sharma, a former ABP News anchor has been morphed to the template. BOOM has previously debunked photoshopped graphics attributed to ABP News.
